rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. The sum of digits in every cage is the same throughout the grid. It is part of solving to determine the sum.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. The sum of digits in every cage is the same throughout the grid. It is part of solving to determine the sum.
